title: Shawn Mendes’ Foundation Donates $175,000 To Toronto’s SickKids For COVID-19 Relief
description: The donation will support “urgent screening and prevention” of COVID-19 for children, the 21-year-old said.
content: Shawn Mendes attends the nd Annual GRAMMY Awards at STAPLES Center on January in Los Angeles California Photo by Frazer Harrison Getty Images for The Recording Academy Getty Images for The Recording Academy Canadian singer Shawn Mende chars
